7a133fc114f6da10cee7d0c2ec7698d3.question_template: donne moi la courbe d'evolution d'inscriptions
7a133fc114f6da10cee7d0c2ec7698d3.sql_template:
SELECT YEAR(Date) AS annee, COUNT(*) AS total_inscriptions 
FROM inscriptioneleve 
GROUP BY YEAR(Date) 
ORDER BY annee

c3f9720a4d8c90741554cb760cb91949.question_template: donne moi le nombre des enseingants
c3f9720a4d8c90741554cb760cb91949.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_enseignants FROM enseingant

5528ecb91dab2a31a6f6605682f3dcde.question_template: donne moi le nombre des eleves inscris pour {AnneeScolaire}
5528ecb91dab2a31a6f6605682f3dcde.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_eleves FROM inscriptioneleve ie WHERE ie.AnneeScolaire = (SELECT id FROM anneescolaire WHERE AnneeScolaire = '{AnneeScolaire}')

95028ee3a6482e29a3d505b97cf5f888.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_eleves FROM eleve

fefc83db0665109dc6c86ea1bf044527.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_reinscriptions FROM inscriptioneleve ie WHERE ie.TypeInscri = 'R' AND ie.AnneeScolaire = (SELECT id FROM anneescolaire WHERE AnneeScolaire = '{AnneeScolaire}')

270603fff1a5aeefe5b23cb0b88c6c18.question_template: donne moi le nombre des classes
270603fff1a5aeefe5b23cb0b88c6c18.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_classes FROM classe

94df1df882950eced16e9d7cd15ac041.question_template: donne moi le nombre des eleves
94df1df882950eced16e9d7cd15ac041.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_eleves FROM eleve

b13cffa80ec07043dd94832d412b9431.question_template: donne moi le nombre des inscriptions pour {AnneeScolaire}
b13cffa80ec07043dd94832d412b9431.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_inscriptions FROM inscriptioneleve WHERE AnneeScolaire = (SELECT id FROM anneescolaire WHERE AnneeScolaire = '{AnneeScolaire}')

620c0c8066b87beff9618de7abcb5f61.question_template: donne moi nombre des nouvelles inscriptions
620c0c8066b87beff9618de7abcb5f61.sql_template: SELECT COUNT(*) as nombre_nouvelles_inscriptions FROM inscriptioneleve WHERE TypeInscri = 'N'

824178632d1aeaf9399e657af4c8ccb6.question_template: donne moi la repartition des eleves
